desc.p: This determines the rounding method to be used for a Subscription transaction. Standard T24 rounding rules ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
Mandatory Input. Allowed values are ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN and APPROXIMATION
Field is removed (Field doesnot exist)
Field is removed (Field doesnot exist)
Field is removed (Field doesnot exist)

The number of decimal units required to be rounded if the digit to the right of the required decimal places is greater than zero then the last required decimal will be rounded up to the next integer based on the rounding type ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
Mandatory Input

If the digit to the right of the required decimal places is greater than zero then the last required decimal will be rounded up to the next integer based on the rounding type ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
Mandatory Input
Field is removed (Field doesnot exist)
Field is removed (Field doesnot exist)
This determines the rounding method to be used for Redemption transactions expressed in units. Standard T24 rounding rules ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
Mandatory Input. Allowed values are ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
This determines the rounding method to be used for Redemption transactions expressed as an Amount. Standard T24 rounding rules ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
Mandatory Input. Allowed values are ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
Description for the MF.ROUNDING.PARAM table
This the key of the file MF.ROUNDING.PARAM.

If the digit to the right of the required decimal places is greater than zero then the last required decimal will be rounded up to the next integer based on the rounding type ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
Mandatory Input.
This determines the rounding method to be used for the applicable NAV in a transaction. Standard T24 rounding rules ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
Mandatory Input. Allowed values are ROUNDUP, ROUNDDOWN or APPROXIMATION
